text: I’ve been trying to get started with Makie, and I repeatedly get this error: `ERROR: UndefVarError: isnothing not defined`. I’ve added `Makie`, `GLMakie`, and `AbstractPlotting`, but no matter which example from the tutorial I run in the REPL, the error shows up. Can anyone help me get this set up?

elements.text: I’ve been trying to get started with Makie, and I repeatedly get this error:
, but no matter which example from the tutorial I run in the REPL, the error shows up. Can anyone help me get this set up?

text: `isnothing` was introduced in Julia 1.1, so it sounds like you’re probably using Julia 1.0 and getting versions of the packages aimed at later Julia versions. That probably indicates the compat wasn’t set completely right on the Makie packages, but also try Julia 1.5 (the latest stable release) and things should work

text: you’re right - just reainstalled Julia and it’s working now on 1.5. I have no idea how I ended up with the older version in the first place. Thank you for your help
